item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: Carmen Anthony

"Carmen Anthony's is one of New Haven's most popular restaurants, occupying the first floor of the prestigious One Audubon Building, the handsome bar looks out at the downtown business neighborhood through a floor-to-ceiling concave window. A popular feature of all Carmen Anthony Restaurants is thier private wine lockers made available to discerning patrons. Fine dining at Carmen Anthony Steakhouse of New Haven is made complete by outstanding coffee and espresso service, our luscious house-made desserts, and our full selection of Grappa, Scotch, Bourbon and Cognac."

A sincere thanks to fellow NHC'er Dawn who has coordinated the very first NHC happy hour at Carmen Anthony's. In true welcoming fashion, the owners of Carmen Anthony's have agreed to give us our own private bar in the back of the restaurant with the following specials offered for the evening:

$5.00 - Glasses of Wine
$1.00 off all beers

In addition, they will be offering us a sampling of their delicious appetizers and selections from their bar menu.


Your contact is: Jeanie (860) 942-4708

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.

Ever.

***Bring a friend***
